18 bed student house to Let Hoole, Chester -
£105pw
   
Current Availability: 1 bed available

Hoole road, Hoole, Chester, CH2 3NT (ref: 114740)		  
   
 
a bit about the property
All rooms are en suite, inclusive of all utility bills.

Laundry room

Large common room.

Off street parking, bicycle shed, free bicycle for each room.

Secure parking



Walking distance to Chester University Campuses and the Centre of Chester.

Every room comes with the free use of a brand new bicycle!
